column1: Haliyal is a town in Uttara Kannada in the Indian state of Karnataka. It is the headquarters town for Haliyal Taluka. It can be classified as a main-road town. It has fort called "killa" to see tourist in town area only. It has various tourist places like ambikanagar Sykes point
Haliyal has an average elevation of 559 metres (1834 feet).

column3: 652. Males constituted 51% of the population. Haliyal had an average literacy rate of 66%
column4: higher than the national average (59.5%); male literacy was 72%
column5: and female literacy was 60%.  In 2001 in Haliyal
column6: 13% of the population was under 6 years of age. Kannada is the main language spoken in the city.
